title: Yarrow Stalk I Ching Divination
description: Traditional I Ching divination method to explore patterns and trends in the development of things

process.title: Divination Process
process.introText: 50 yarrow stalks represent the numbers of Heaven and Earth. Take 1 aside to represent the Great Ultimate, leaving 49 for the operation.
process.divideSticksText: Divide {0} stalks into left pile ({1}) and right pile ({2}).
process.takeOneFromRightText: Take 1 from right pile, hold between little finger and ring finger, right pile now has {0}.
process.leftRemainderText: Count left pile by fours, remaining {0} stalks held between ring and middle fingers.
process.rightRemainderText: Count right pile by fours, remaining {0} stalks held between middle and index fingers.
process.firstChangeAdjust: First change total of {0} stalks adjusted to standard value of {1}.
process.laterChangeAdjust: Change {0} total of {1} stalks adjusted to standard value of {2}.

lineResults.oldYin: Old Yin (6) - Yin line, changing, becomes Yang
lineResults.oldYang: Old Yang (9) - Yang line, changing, becomes Yin
